name: Channel Hate
text: You masterfully inspire in others violence toward those you hate.
benefit: As a standard action, you can expend one use of your channel energy ability to affect a single creature within 30 feet as if you had cast vengeful outrage (caster level equal to your effective cleric level). Upon obtaining channel energy 9d6, you can affect a number of creatures within 30 feet equal to your Charisma bonus (minimum 2 creatures) with this feat instead. If you expend an extra use of channel energy when using this feat, the target does not gain a second saving throw against this effect if you designate the target’s friend or loved one as its hated enemy.
text_zh: 你擅长与挑拨人心中互相敌视的负面情绪。
benefit_zh: 以一个标准动作，你可以消耗一发本日的引导能量次数，对一个距离你30尺内的生物施放法术复仇之怒（Vengeful Outrage）UM效果的影响（施法者等级等同于你的有效牧师等级）。当你的引导能量提升到9d6时，你可以影响的生物数量将等同于你的魅力调整值（至少两个）。如果你额外消耗一发引导能量来使用此能力，受到法术影响的目标将在攻击自己的友人或爱人时不获得第二次额外豁免的机会。
